def is_coffee_maker(item: item):
    return is_coffe_maker(item)

behavior prepare_coffee(coffee_maker: item):
    body:
        if not is_on(coffee_maker):
            switch_on(coffee_maker)
        # Ensure the coffee maker is turned on

        if not has_water(coffee_maker):
            get_water(coffee_maker)
        # Add water to the coffee maker if not already present

        assert is_on(coffee_maker) and has_water(coffee_maker)
        # Ensure all conditions are met for coffee making

behavior __goal__():
    body:
        bind coffee_maker: item where:
            is_coffee_maker(coffee_maker)
        
        prepare_coffee(coffee_maker)
        # Begin the coffeemaking process using the coffee maker

def is_ready_to_brew(coffee_maker:item):
    # Determine if the coffee maker is ready to brew
    symbol ready= is_on(coffee_maker) and has_water(coffee_maker)
    return ready

behavior prepare_coffee(coffee_maker:item):
    body:
        observe(coffee_maker, "Check if coffee maker has water")

        if not has_water(coffee_maker):
            bind faucet: item where:
                is_faucet(faucet)
            walk(faucet)
            switch_on(faucet)
            get_water(coffee_maker)
            switch_off(faucet)

        observe(coffee_maker, "Check if coffee maker is open and has coffee filter and coffee ground
s")
        switch_on(coffee_maker)

behavior __goal__():
    body:
        bind coffee_maker: item where:
            is_coffe_maker(coffee_maker)
        walk(coffee_maker)
        if not is_ready_to_brew(coffee_maker):
            prepare_coffee(coffee_maker)
